exposurecontrol: Auto exposure measurement. Manual switching system (flashing LED indicator signals recommended setting)
flash: Constant firing flash (automatic light adjustment) Recycle time: 0.2 sec. to 6 sec. (when using new batteries), Effective flash range: 0.6m - 2.7 m
powersupply: Two LR6/AA-size 1.5V alkaline batteries Capacity: 10 film packs (based on our company research)
others: Exposure counter (number of unexposed film sheets), film pack confirmation window
viewfinder: Real image finder 0.37x with target spot
